Text: OH BOY!!!!  at long last!  I must download this ASAP!  WOW!!!  you have no Idea how long I've been waiting for this...
pardon me for being skeptical, given the large amount of fake emulators bundled with virus' and trojans.  if it's the real deal I'll apologise...

It's not the real deal, couldn't be..Most ps1 games for the ePSXe will be around the 400mb-500mb mark...40mb just doesn't cut it..as well as the emulator

Get a life

Besides this is not even the newest form of the emulator itself. 1.7 was released on May 24 2008.
I would wager this is a virus loaded POS.
